nodes.text: Fin Danglot was a Human male pilot who served in the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War. He was mentored by fellow pilot Puck Naeco, along with Keyan Farlander and Milar Travis.

The character of Fin Danglot was first mentioned in the 1989 first edition of the West End Games sourcebook Galaxy Guide 1: A New Hope as an example of a standard Rebel starfighter pilot, providing the character with a name and roleplaying stats only.
The image accompanying the article (seen here) was later used in Galaxy Guide 3: The Empire Strikes Back alongside the name and stats of pilot Tenk Lenso.
